reviewText: Have you have ever considered taking the path less traveled? Have you ever considered following a dream? Have you ever wanted to push yourself to new limits? If so, this inspirational film is well worth watching!

This video documents the travels of three young men whose mother died from a brain tumor, I can relate as my father and younger sister also died from a brain tumor. Anyone with a sense of adventure will enjoy this documentary and the proceeds all go to the National Brain Tumor Society.

Spinning Southward arrived in the mail yesterday and I watched it last night. This movie is inspirational and just what I needed to see. I really enjoyed the contrast of film and photo and also the interview based dialogue that shared the journey with everyone encountered. Well worth watching and supporting the National Brain Tumor Society makes the purchase well worthwhile. Enjoy!
